title: Ernest Hemingway 4616 47mm Round Designer Reading Glasses in Tortoise +1.50
description: Ernest Hemingway Eyewear is a vintage-inspired roundup of retro zyls in rich tortoises and classic colors, as well as blue, green, yellow and pink crystal. Expertly crafted metal-zyl combinations and retro round metals in sought-after shapes such as luxurious cat eyes and 1950s inspired looks. Many of the styles have temple and front hinge plaques and/or rivet designs that round out the offerings. A companion hard metal case with faux distressed leather and signature plaque will complete the classic look of this American iconâ€™s branding.
